setZeroBased.name: Set zero based range band.
setZeroBased.hint: Sets range band to begin at position 0.

setTacticalBased.name: Tactical setting.
setTacticalBased.hint: Sets range band to convert to yards instead of range bands.

opportunity-helper-data.name: Dice Helper Journal
opportunity-helper-data.hint: Dice helper suggestions will be read from this journal.

opportunity-hide-filler.name: Hide extra text & image in opportunities popup
opportunity-hide-filler.hint: Dice helper suggestions will only display text and opportunities.

actor-helper.name: Display Wounds
actor-helper.hint: Enable wound display to resolve after a targeted roll.

warning.NoFind: Failed to find journal - make sure it's created or something
warning.InvalidData: Dice helper: invalid data detected in journal

misc.CritStrike: Inflict a critical strike on your target with severity equal to your weapon's deadliness.
misc.FailedOpps: If you failed, provide assistance to the next character trying to accomplish the same action.
